description: Buri mubyeyi ate uburenganzira ku buzima bwiza, cyane cyane igihe atwite cyangwa amaze kubyara.
title: Buri mubyeyi ate uburenganzira ku buzima bwiza, cyane cyane igihe atwite cyangwa amaze kubyara. Abaganga n’abajyanama b’ubuzima bagomba kuba bate ubumenyingiro kandi bagomba kwakira ababyeyi bose ndet
content: Buri mubyeyi ate uburenganzira ku buzima bwiza, cyane cyane igihe atwite cyangwa amaze kubyara. Abaganga n’abajyanama b’ubuzima bagomba kuba bate ubumenyingiro kandi bagomba kwakira ababyeyi bose ndetse n’abangavu ku buryo bumwe nta marangamutima bakoresheje.
